publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3286 Brian Adam: Pedestrian Crossing on North Anderson Drive, Aberdeenâ€”That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to instruct BEAR Scotland to install a pedestrian crossing on North Anderson Drive, Aberdeen, at a point at the northern end of Smithfield Drive and to the south of Hilton Drive.
S1M-3286 Pedestrian Crossing on North Anderson Drive, Aberdeen (lodged on 19 July 2002) Shona Robison*, Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3286 Pedestrian Crossing on North Anderson Drive, Aberdeen (lodged on 19 July 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
